title: #86 Bravo Breakdown (#RHOC, #RHOA, #RHONJ, #RHOD Recaps) with Lyric Lewis

description:
In this supersized ep of Everything Iconic, Danny breaks down the week in Housewives, recapping Real Housewives of Orange County, Real Housewives of Atlanta (with special guest Lyric Lewis from NBC's AP Bio), Real Housewives of New Jersey, and Real Housewives of Dallas.


#RHOC Recap: 6:58

#RHOA with Lyric Lewis: 25:30ish

#RHONJ: 56:00ish

#RHOD: 1:04ish


*For bonus episodes and to support the podcast, visit www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic*

LINKS:
